main event: A civilian observed a round, luminous object traveling at a rapid rate of speed and disappearing suddenly in the sky near Mt. Vernon, New York in 1965.
interesting points: The object had a halo-like glow around it and was visible for about one minute.
The object traversed the sky for approximately 45 degrees.
The witness estimated the object to be 50 to 100 feet in diameter, traveling at an altitude of several thousand feet.
The witness was unable to obtain a photograph of the object as they did not have a camera available at the time.
The witness was convinced the object was of extraterrestrial origin.
